name: Defeat plastic pollution
description: We will gather to Museo di pietrarsa in San Giovanni a teduccio(NA) to discuss new ways to recycle plastic products, meet experts from all over the world and make our voice count!!

name: Act Now!
description: People must be informed about the critical level of plastic pollution in our oceans. You can make the difference! Help us to raise awareness about the condition of our planet!

name: Bin San Giovanni a Teduccio
description: This is a bin for plastics

name: Collection Point San Giovanni a Teduccio
description: This is a collection point for plastics
